Translations.Text: Wahe kawonlon bek jeut keu salah Bek sabab dawa gata deungon lon j Keu gata bandum keunong musibah Lagee nyang keunong ubak kawom Noh Kawom Hud Saleh bandum jih salah Kawom Luth pih han jioh ngon gata
Talakee sigra ampon bak Allah € Talakee ampon bak Tuhan gata Toubat beu sigra bek le buet salah Keubit Tuhan lon Pemurah that-that Geumaseh pih that hana ban peugah

Jikheun hai Syuʻib di kamoe bandum Le hana meuphom peue nyang tapeugah Kamoe eu gata lam kawan kamoe Leumoh that lagoe kon ureueng meugah Adak kon rame famili gata Meurajam gata hana soe teugah Han jeut keu susah kamoe ngon gata
Syuʻib kheun sigra teuma geupeugah Wahe kawomlon peue famili lon Leubeh tajunjong jih nibak Allah Tapeujeut Tuhan di likot gata Allah Taʻala Neuteupue sudah Po lon Neuteupue peue nyang tapubuet

Boh jak le pubuet peue nyang tailah Tapubuet laju nyang ek di gata Di lon pih teuma lon pubuet bagah Akan tateupue keu soe troh azeub Nyang ayeb jih that hana ban peugah Lom pih teteupue soe nyang meusulet Tapreh hana trep meuri nyang salah Di lon pih lonpreh saban ngon gata

‘Oh ban troh teuka teuma musibah ‘Oh teuka bala sideh bak Kamoe Syuʻib le jinoe kamoe peusiblah Ngon ureueng mukmin nyang sajan gopnyan Rahmat le keunan nyang Kamoe ruah Awak nyang lalem ka geulanteu tak Han jiteumee jak bandum ka reubah Dalam rumohjih sinan meuseumpom
Sang-sang hana tom keunan jilangkah Awak Madyan bandum binasa Saban cit juga Tsamud seurakah
Teuma ka Kamoe kirem lom Musa Ayat geujakba Kamoe peurintah Mvʻjizat nyata lom geuba sajan
Ubak Peureuʻun kaphe seurakah Ubak Peuraʻun deungon kawomjih Jiikot dum jih dalam buet salah Kon ureueng beutoi cit Peuraʻun nyan
